item.title: Spring's Controllers are single or multiple instances and how to secure concurrency？
item.author: Author
item.description: ANSWER： The controller is singleton by default, so don’t use non-static member variables, otherwise data logic will be confused. It is because of this single instance that it is not thread-safe.
